item.title: Running Uptime on Heroku
item.author: dave@petzel.email (David Petzel)
item.description: For today’s adventure I’ve decided to finally get my hands dirty with Heroku. I’ve know about it for a while now, and have gone so far as reading some of the documentation, however I’ve never actually tried using it. So today, I decided to change that.
